item.title: By: Jason Cosper
item.dc:creator: Jason Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/rihanna-hearts-mac-giveaway/#comment-278">Nicole O.</a>.
Just an update: We've had to disable Pinterest sharing for this giveaway as it's going to take a few days (which is longer than we have left) to sort that warning out. Sorry about that!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nicole O..

Just an update: We’ve had to disable Pinterest sharing for this giveaway as it’s going to take a few days (which is longer than we have left) to sort that warning out. Sorry about that!

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper

item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Nicole O.
item.dc:creator: Nicole O.
item.description:
Hi!
Thank you so much for the chance!
I wanted to let you know that I was trying to post this giveaway on Pinterest but a window popped up saying that the link is suspicious?
I took a printscreen: http://oi44.tinypic.com/xlfojo.jpg
item.content:encoded:
Hi!

Thank you so much for the chance!

I wanted to let you know that I was trying to post this giveaway on Pinterest but a window popped up saying that the link is suspicious?

I took a printscreen: http://oi44.tinypic.com/xlfojo.jpg
